member.name: T:System.Net.IPHostEntry
member.summary: Provides a container class for Internet host address information.

member.name: M:System.Net.IPHostEntry.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:System.Net.IPHostEntry.AddressList
member.summary: Gets or sets a list of IP addresses that are associated with a host.
member.returns: An array of type that contains IP addresses that resolve to the host names that are contained in the property.

member.name: P:System.Net.IPHostEntry.Aliases
member.summary: Gets or sets a list of aliases that are associated with a host.
member.returns: An array of strings that contain DNS names that resolve to the IP addresses in the property.

member.name: P:System.Net.IPHostEntry.HostName
member.summary: Gets or sets the DNS name of the host.
member.returns: A string that contains the primary host name for the server.

member.name: T:System.Net.Dns
member.summary: Provides simple domain name resolution functionality.

member.name: M:System.Net.Dns.BeginGetHostAddresses(System.String,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)
member.summary: Asynchronously returns the Internet Protocol (IP) addresses for the specified host.
member.param: The host name or IP address to resolve.
An delegate that references the method to invoke when the operation is complete.
A user-defined object that contains information about the operation. This object is passed to the requestCallback delegate when the operation is complete.
member.returns: An instance that references the asynchronous request.
member.exception: hostNameOrAddress is null.
The length of hostNameOrAddress is greater than 255 characters.
An error is encountered when resolving hostNameOrAddress.
hostNameOrAddress is an invalid IP address.

member.name: M:System.Net.Dns.BeginGetHostByName(System.String,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)
member.summary: Begins an asynchronous request for information about the specified DNS host name.
member.param: The DNS name of the host.
An delegate that references the method to invoke when the operation is complete.
A user-defined object that contains information about the operation. This object is passed to the requestCallback delegate when the operation is complete.
member.returns: An instance that references the asynchronous request.
member.exception: hostName is null.
An error was encountered executing the DNS query.

member.name: M:System.Net.Dns.BeginGetHostEntry(System.Net.IPAddress,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)
member.summary: Asynchronously resolves an IP address to an instance.
member.param: The IP address to resolve.
An delegate that references the method to invoke when the operation is complete.
A user-defined object that contains information about the operation. This object is passed to the requestCallback delegate when the operation is complete.
member.returns: An instance that references the asynchronous request.
member.exception: address is null.
An error is encountered when resolving address.
address is an invalid IP address.

member.name: M:System.Net.Dns.BeginGetHostEntry(System.String,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)
member.summary: Asynchronously resolves a host name or IP address to an instance.
member.param: The host name or IP address to resolve.
An delegate that references the method to invoke when the operation is complete.
A user-defined object that contains information about the operation. This object is passed to the requestCallback delegate when the operation is complete.
member.returns: An instance that references the asynchronous request.
member.exception: hostNameOrAddress is null.
The length of hostNameOrAddress is greater than 255 characters.
An error is encountered when resolving hostNameOrAddress.
hostNameOrAddress is an invalid IP address.

member.name: M:System.Net.Dns.BeginResolve(System.String,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)
member.summary: Begins an asynchronous request to resolve a DNS host name or IP address to an instance.
member.param: The DNS name of the host.
An delegate that references the method to invoke when the operation is complete.
A user-defined object that contains information about the operation. This object is passed to the requestCallback delegate when the operation is complete.
member.returns: An instance that references the asynchronous request.
member.exception: hostName is null.
The caller does not have permission to access DNS information.

member.name: M:System.Net.Dns.EndGetHostAddresses(System.IAsyncResult)
member.summary: Ends an asynchronous request for DNS information.
member.param: An instance returned by a call to the method.
member.returns: An array of type that holds the IP addresses for the host specified by the hostNameOrAddress parameter of .

member.name: M:System.Net.Dns.EndGetHostByName(System.IAsyncResult)
member.summary: Ends an asynchronous request for DNS information.
member.param: An instance that is returned by a call to the method.
member.returns: An object that contains DNS information about a host.
member.exception: asyncResult is null.

member.name: M:System.Net.Dns.EndGetHostEntry(System.IAsyncResult)
member.summary: Ends an asynchronous request for DNS information.
member.param: An instance returned by a call to an method.
member.returns: An instance that contains address information about the host.
member.exception: asyncResult is null.

member.name: M:System.Net.Dns.EndResolve(System.IAsyncResult)
member.summary: Ends an asynchronous request for DNS information.
member.param: An instance that is returned by a call to the method.
member.returns: An object that contains DNS information about a host.
member.exception: asyncResult is null.

member.name: M:System.Net.Dns.GetHostAddresses(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the Internet Protocol (IP) addresses for the specified host.
member.param: The host name or IP address to resolve.
member.returns: An array of type that holds the IP addresses for the host that is specified by the hostNameOrAddress parameter.
member.exception: hostNameOrAddress is null.
The length of hostNameOrAddress is greater than 255 characters.
An error is encountered when resolving hostNameOrAddress.
hostNameOrAddress is an invalid IP address.

member.name: M:System.Net.Dns.GetHostAddressesAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the Internet Protocol (IP) addresses for the specified host as an asynchronous operation.
member.param: The host name or IP address to resolve.
member.returns: Returns . The task object representing the asynchronous operation. The property on the task object returns an array of type that holds the IP addresses for the host that is specified by the hostNameOrAddress parameter.
member.exception: hostNameOrAddress is null.
The length of hostNameOrAddress is greater than 255 characters.
An error is encountered when resolving hostNameOrAddress.
hostNameOrAddress is an invalid IP address.

member.returns: An instance.

member.name: M:System.Net.Dns.GetHostByName(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the DNS information for the specified DNS host name.

member.returns: An object that contains host information for the address specified in hostName.

address is an invalid IP address.

address is an invalid IP address.

member.name: M:System.Net.Dns.GetHostName
member.summary: Gets the host name of the local computer.
member.returns: A string that contains the DNS host name of the local computer.
member.exception: An error is encountered when resolving the local host name.

member.name: M:System.Net.Dns.Resolve(System.String)
member.summary: Resolves a DNS host name or IP address to an instance.
member.param: A DNS-style host name or IP address.
member.returns: An instance that contains address information about the host specified in hostName.
member.exception: hostName is null.
The length of hostName is greater than 255 characters.
